quest.subtitle: Quest 03 - Group Quest
quest.title: The Candlestick Laboratory
quest.questtext: Look out heroes, the emperors wizard Wemperor was taking all the candlesticks and is hiding them in his mountain hideout Castle of Candle. Seek him out and save as many Candlesticks as you can
quest.notes: This is a lofty cloud candle castle The first hero to search the Alchemist Bench will find a candlestick.
